text: (mese kurban kala vuvada), uge mas mamsa ho nætahot uge le ho allah veta gos sendu vanne næta. obage (parisuddhabhavayada) bhaya bhaktiyama ohu veta gos sendu vanneya. allah obata rju margaya dænum dima venuven (ohuta oba kurbani di) ohuva oba adambara kirima (pinisa mese eva obata vasanga kara dunneya. nabiye! mese kurbani di), krtagna vannanta oba subharamci denu mænava
